Spells:
Cone Of Cold (Bloodline Boreal6 Evoc): R60' Cone inflicts 15d6 HP (DC 19 Ref half)
Control Winds (Blizzard5 Tran): R800' Changes wind direction and speed 6 levels in 800'x40' cylinder for 200 min
Elemental Aura (Bloodline Boreal3 Evoc): Creatures adjacent to self suffer 2d6 HP chosen energy plus energy-specific effects (DC 16 Ref half HP only) for 20 rd
Enlarge Person (Bloodline Boreal1 Tran): R75' Target humanoid dbl size (+2 Strength, -2 Dexterity, -1 attack, -1 AC) (DC 14 Fort neg) for 20 min
Fire Shield (Snow Shroud4 Evoc): Cold or hot flames enveloping self inflict 1d6+15 HP and reduce heat or cold damage by half upon foe hit (DC 16 Ref no HP) for 20 rd
Giant Form I (Bloodline Boreal7 Tran): Self becomes large giant (+6 Strength, -2 Dexterity, +4 Constitution, +4 AC, low-light vision, form abilities) for 20 min
Meteor Swarm (Bloodline Boreal9 Evoc): R1200' 4 spheres inflict 6d6 HP fire in 40' radius (DC 22 Ref half), ranged touch +2d6 HP bludgeoning
Polar Ray (Bloodline Boreal8 Evoc): R300' Ranged touch inflicts 20d6 HP, -1d4 Dexterity
Rage (Bloodline Boreal3 Ench): R300' 6 willing targets in 15' radius gain +2 Strength, +2 Constitution, and +1 Will and suffer -2 AC for conc + 20 rd
Sleet Storm (Blizzard3 Conj): R1200' Sleet in 40' radius binds, inflicts DC 10 Acrobatics to move for 20 rd
Spider Climb (Icewalker2 Tran): Touched gains 20' climb speed and can climb walls and ceilings for 200 min
Transformation (Bloodline Boreal6 Tran): Self gains +4 Strength, Dexterity, Constitution, and AC, +5 Fortitude, martial weapon proficiency, and BAB 20, but cannot cast spells, for 20 rd
Wall Of Ice (Bloodline Boreal4 Evoc): R300' Creates 20 10' x 20 inch thick ice wall or 23' hemisphere for 20 min
Magic Notes:
Charisma Sorcerer Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level S1, S2, S3
Spell Focus (Necromancy): +1 Spell DC (Necromancy)
Blizzard (Sorcerer): May use combined Control Winds and Sleet Storm effects centered on self 1/dy
Bloodline Boreal: +1 save DC on cold spells
Cold Steel: Touched weapon inflicts +1d6 HP cold for 10 rd or gains icy burst property for 5 rd 6/dy
Craft Wand: May create wands for up to 4th level spell
Ectoplasmic Spell: May spend +1 spell slot to target an incorporeal or ethereal creature
Elemental Spell (Acid): May use +1 spell slot to convert half or all spell damage to acid damage
Eschew Materials: May cast spells w/out materials
Expanded Arcana: +1 spells known, or +2 of lower than max level
Icewalker: May use Spider Climb effects at will on icy surfaces
Snow Shroud: May use cold Fire Shield effects that give 20% attack miss and +10 Stealth in snowy or icy areas for 20 rd 3/dy
Thundering Spell: May spend +2 spell slot to deafen target (spell save or Fort neg) for spell level rd
